Welcome to the World of Rolex

Discover the pinnacle
of precision and elegance.

Rolex, over the years, has redefined the horological industry with its groundbreaking innovations and unparalleled craftsmanship.

From introducing the first waterproof wristwatch to pioneering the automatic date changing mechanism, Rolex's contributions to watchmaking are unparalleled.

Learn More

The Legacy Behind the Timepiece The Legacy Behind the Timepiece The Legacy Behind the Timepiece

Founded in 1905, Rolex's journey from a small watch company to a global luxury icon is filled with milestones and achievements.
  • 1905 Rolex emerges, revolutionizing the concept of time.
  • 1926 Datejust debuts, setting a new standard for wristwatches.
  • 1945 Rolex unveils the first-ever waterproof wristwatch.

Explore in 3D

Experience the Rolex watch like never before. Dive into our interactive 3D model and explore every intricate detail.

Use your mouse or touch gestures to rotate, zoom, and explore the watch in a 3D space. Discover the craftsmanship and precision that goes into every Rolex timepiece.
